secret.description: The Base32 encoded random bytes secret key

digits.description: The digits parameter may have the values 6 or 8, and determines how long of a one-time passcode to display to the user. The default is 6.

counter.description: The counter parameter is required when provisioning a key for use with HOTP. It will set the initial counter value.

period.description: The period parameter defines a period that a TOTP code will be valid for, in seconds. The default value is 30.
